lakmal sampurna nama - abesinha wijesekara lakmal wayasa - awurudu 26 yi usa - adi 5 angal 4 yi pasala - hungama wijayaba jathika widuhala wenath kandayam - wijayaba krida samajaya krida karana sthanaya - libaro chals thilakarathna mahatha (puhunukaru) sampurna nama - je. em. chals thilakarathna mahatha wayasa - awurudu 46 yi krida samajaya - naththandiya yunayitang krida samajaya nalin sampath mahatha (sahaya puhunukaru) sampurna nama - nalin sampath abesinha wayasa - awurudu 42 yi pasala - mathara shantha sarweshas widuhala krida samajaya - guwan hamudawa em. ke. sunil mahatha (abhyasaka) sampurna nama - ke. em. ke. sunil mahatha wayasa - awurudu 41 yi pasala - thalahagamwaduwa maha widuhala

polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari buddhika siriwardhana mahatha kiya sitiye labunu thorathurakata anuwa sidukala watalimakadi mowun athadanguwatagena athi bawayi.
noboda jathyanthara madhya awadhanaya dinagath warthawakata anuwa erata arthapal waga karana gowiyeku ee wenuwen riyadureku rahitha si same yantha්rayak bhawitha karayi.
mese papu pradeshaya pamana ikmawa palal wu kanthawange kamashawa anya kanthawanta wada wadi kere.
samaharawita ee kalayedi meya pilikawalata saha wenath barapathala upadrawayanta hethuwana wanabawa nodana sitinnata athi.
kathawak kiyanna sujanama .
me gana ahala thiyada..?
kiyek ki dena da mehema enne.

apa aluthin ekathuwuna aasana 3 samanga wishala jayagrahanayak laba gannawa yayi parlimenthu katayuthu amathini sumedha jayasena mahathmiya monaragala di pawasuwaya.amathiwariya wadiduratath mese da pawasuwaya.ape disthrikkaye jayagrahanaya ada wadiwela.
githa, sinamawa, sangithaya mewani sakala kalawan..
honda aya wenne wath natha.
chodana laba thibuna da oonama ayekuta adhikaranaya hamuwe siya nirdoshithwaya penwimata awasthawak thibiya yuthuya yana ayithiya yi.
pilithura – juni 19 wanida, brahaspathinda lankawe prawruththi mata labune ithama aduwen.
deshapalanaya sampurnayenma randapawathinne bhashawa mathaya.
thawa podi deyak kiyanna oni..
uuta nathi mata thiyena de mokakda ahanawa dilini oya tharam mata kamathi wenna...”

in pasu ohu mata pitupasa […]niruwath kota paharadi, mallige namin ayiyawa usawi dala udugampala padinchi karuwakuwana sisira kumarata, wadhadi usawi dama, […]thayi sankranthika lingika shramikayin gedaratama ganika sewawa sapayana madamla saha bosla muhuna dena pradhana […]
ithama asiru dawas 59k gewala mama ewarast kanda mudunatama giya.
anathuruwa dwithiyika adhyapanaya anuradhapura madhya maha widuhalen labiya.
hiru upa paddhathi kotas sthapanaya sambandhayen sthana sthapitha, jala-hitar athulu, payippa, kapata, ha upayogi upakarana.
samaweyan riplayi parakku wunata.
wisheshayen pa්rathikara labaganimen pasu bhikshun wadath durwala wimata balapa hethun unwahanse anada therungen yali wimasimen pahadili we.
dan awula lihenna athi maye hithe :))
eya ese wuwath ihatha thorathuru wimasimen peni yanne mehi pradhana deshakayo bhikshun wahanse bawayi.
sansara wimukthiya sandaha mama buddha dharmaya hadarami.
sayitam aayathanayen upadhiyak laba gath thaman waidya wruththikayan lesa liyapadinchi kirima waidya sabhawa wisin pa්rathikshepa karana bawada sisun dedena mema pethsama gonu kara thibuna.
eeka thanakadi gayid malli yanna harima amaru parak dige yamu kiyala kiwwa, ithin mamath giya.
me kiyana de de harida ?

me sadhaka walata amatharawa krushirasayana mangin bona wathurata ekathu wela thibena aasanika rasayanikaya , menma wikiranath hethu karakayan widiyata idiripath wenawa ...me sadhakath ekka baluwama penawa athi meka “pirimi kansar “ ekak noweyi , kanthawantath penahalu pilika awadhanama thibenawa ..owunuth me gana danuwath wima harima wadagath ....mata nam hithenne kanthawan hariyata me awadanama handunagannawa nam penahalu pilika awadanama sahenna adukaranna owunta puluwan kiyala..hethuwa hitha ganna puluwanda ?
ehema wethdi ema prastharaya niwaradiwa idiriyata andima wage wadak karala agayayan thiranaya karanawa.
tharaka saha grahayan dewargayak neda?
juni mase mula...sathi dekak withara akamadeshan hoyaganna oone..."

pasugiya janadhipathiwaranaye di idiripath kala maithi්ra palanayak sthawara ratak pa්rathipaththi pa්rakashanaye sobadahama raka ganima kotasa yatathe 32 wana pituwe sandahan kara aththe wana saththwa ha wrukshalatha aarakshaka aagnya panatha nobiyawa ha pakshaga්rahi bawin thorawa dadi lesa ki්rayathmaka kirimata katayuthu karana bawaya.
kurulu wisheshagnyayan kiyanne mese sudu pahathi pihatu athi wima wilopikayange pahasu goduru wimata magak wenawa pamanak noweyi, rogawalata goduru wime pa්rawanathawath wadi wena bawayi.
godak wadagath sthuthiyi ayiye..
me nithiya noboda sankethanayata gena thuruma apa rate karoke athulu samaja shala thula tharuna sthrin kisidu biyak sakak nathiwa madhyasara bhawitha kirimatath, alawi kirimatath nopasubata wuha.
dan oya je..wi. pi. bayiyaya kiyawi aathathiya wadiwela eeka lihil kara ganna kiyala.
mala peretha kamata bonawa..
eeye niwahana maha madurak wi - anganayada saduna

kabinat mandalaye anumathiya ho laba gena nathi bawa parlimenthuwedi heli wu awasthawedi amathiwaraya eeta pilithuru dima wenuwata sidukale an ayata bana wadima pamanak bawath ema sangamaya wenuwen ehi lekam injineru kapila perera mahatha nikuth kala niwedanaye sandahan weyi.
mama eeka prathikshrepa karanawa.
yudden pasuwa anuradhapurayema wasamin sath koralaye wari karmantha diyunu kaleya.
lankawe inna hungak aya hithana tharam rata jiwithe sundara na...
eeka thamayi rusiyan sammatha sthri drushtiya.
yantham kampiyutarayak atawa ganna ekata eekata giya gana wage degunayak withara wiyadam karala softweyar ekak ganna kiyana eka asadharanayi...
mathiniyani, oba, warin wara pawasana de ape kata awussayi, manasa awussayi ee nisa eewaye agayak naththe nowe.
apage thawath soldaduwan dan wanu atha.
nikan boruwata nidiwage inna gaman oya kage hari namak kiyanawa.
in palamuwanna nam galguhawak mahasangharathnayata puja kirimedi galguhawaka kataramata yatin sellipiyak ketima saha noketima thiranaya wuye kumana sadhakayak padanam kara gena da yannayi.

honda jana sankalanayen hebi manushyayaku wanna uthsaha karamu.
aswanna geta gaththata passe kamatha hiswe­nawa.
meke man mulma gana nisa oogollanta pataleyi kiyala hithala simbal dekak dala nambar 1 saha 2 athulath karata ekama simbal eka athule dammath kisi prashnayak na.

kolambaa maha nagara sabha balapradeshaya kendrakara ganimin basnahira palatha diyunu kirime widhimath wadapiliwelak 2002 eksath jathika paksha aanduwa kriyawata nanwimata salasum kala bawa sihipath kala rawi karunanayaka mahatha ema wadapiliwela sarthakawa kriyathmaka kirimata awasthawa labune nam kolambaa pramukha basnahira palathe janathawata yahapath anagathayak udakara ganimata hakiyawa thibu bawa sihipath kaleya.
skole yana lamayi mewa monata kiyawanawada kiyala?
